name: sanitizeHtml
description: Sanitizes unsafe HTML to protect against XSS attacks

params.name: policy
params.description: Either a org.owasp.html.PolicyFactory or a list of built in policies which allow and sanitize the named element types (see list below).  If omitted then all of the built-in policies are applied.

examples.description: Sanitize a string using built-in policies

examples.title: Specifying a list of built-in policies to exclude certain elements
examples.description: Only allow sanitized link and block elements

examples.description: Only allow sanitized link and block elements
